member.name: M:RuntimeFbx.Util.SaveMesh(UnityEngine.Mesh,System.String)
member.summary: Write the Mesh to a new FBX file. If the file already exists, it is overwritten. Only position and index is supported in lite version.

member.name: M:RuntimeFbx.Util.LoadMesh(System.String)
member.summary: Load a Mesh from a FBX file. Only position and index is supported in lite version.
